Jill Gregory

More articles on 'Electric Dreams'

Jill Gregory is a dream networker and educator who founded the Novato Center for Dreams in 1987. A charter member of the Bay Area Dreamworkers Group, she has served in leadership positions since 1987. She was the Dream Network Bulletin's interviewer from 1987 to 1989, working with Linda Magall√≥n and Bob Trowbridge.
